alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:37PM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a trace to 1 inch below 3000 feet elevation and 1 to 3 inches above 3000 feet elevation. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph near Black Ridge Canyon on Sunday. * WHERE...Lower Washington County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
